theme: Extractable from GDELT event themes (e.g., protest, diplomatic meeting, economic reform, military action)
region: Extractable from GDELT event geographic fields (country, city, region codes, lat/lon)
use_case: Can be inferred by combining GDELT event type + actor roles (e.g., peacekeeping, sanctions, treaty negotiation)

strategic_category.military_doctrine: Extractable when event involves military operations, arms deals, or defense postures
strategic_category.geopolitical_strategy: Inferred from cross-border influence, alliances, regional blocs
strategic_category.national_security: Extractable when event relates to terrorism, surveillance, emergency laws
strategic_category.diplomatic_posture: Extractable from diplomatic events, summits, UN meetings, bilateral talks
strategic_category.geostrategic_positioning: Inferred from base agreements, maritime moves, new alliances

economic_category.development_models: Inferred from infrastructure projects, economic aid, development programs
economic_category.resource_strategies: Extractable from energy deals, resource management, commodity flows
economic_category.trade_tariff_systems: Extractable from trade deals, tariff changes, WTO disputes
economic_category.economic_warfare: Inferred from sanctions, financial blockades, currency maneuvers

civilizational_category.cultural_ethos: Inferred from cultural diplomacy, religious events, festivals
civilizational_category.temporal_orientation: Inferred from historical commemorations or future-oriented initiatives
civilizational_category.value_systems: Inferred from moral/religious debates, human rights discourse
civilizational_category.historical_memory: Extractable from memory politics, reparations, historical disputes
civilizational_category.civilizational_missions: Inferred from expansionist rhetoric, ideological exports

usage_tags: Extractable from GDELT event keywords, themes, and CAMEO codes

influence_map.influenced_works: Inferred by tracing referenced treaties, doctrines, or prior events
influence_map.modern_applications: Inferred from current event applications, follow-ups, policy moves
